# init(frameWidth:frameHeight:scaleFactor:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new low-latency super-resolution scaler configuration with specified frame width and height.

## Declaration

```swift
init(frameWidth: Int, frameHeight: Int, scaleFactor: Float)
```

## Parameters

- **frameWidth**: Width of source frame in pixels.
- **frameHeight**: Height of source frame in pixels.
- **scaleFactor**: The scale factor to apply. This must be a supported value that [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTLowLatencySuperResolutionScalerConfiguration/supportedScaleFactorsForFrameWidth:frameHeight:] returns.
title: init(frameWidth:frameHeight:scaleFactor:)
